attributes.action: Recognise the need for free, non-accredited learning as a means of encouraging enagement in adult education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a need to fund education for adults at a non accredited level which would encourage uptake of adult education. Whilst attainment and qualification are key, there should be provision which concentrates principally on returning adults to a learning environment which they feel comfortable in.
